participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Evelyn is adventurous and loves exploring new cultures. She has a calm demeanor and enjoys sharing stories from her travels.
participant_1.background: i'm 60years old. i really like to travel. i think i will retire in a few years. i am a librarian.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Jordan is imaginative and often dives deep into their gaming worlds. They are creative and sometimes a bit of a dreamer, seeking a balance between reality and their fantasy adventures.
participant_2.background: my dream in life is to work from home. i dye my hair every three months. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games.
